mapper.insert: insert into deliveryplace (deID, dePname, provinceName, cityName, mgName, dePTel, dePAddr, COMMENT) values (#{deid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{depname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provincename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{depaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update deliveryplace set dePname = #{depname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provinceName = #{provincename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cityName = #{cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mgName = #{mgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dePTel = #{deptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dePAddr = #{depaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where deID = #{deid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select deID, dePname, provinceName, cityName, mgName, dePTel, dePAddr, COMMENT from deliveryplace
